title: The new creature A sermon preached at Pauls Crosse, Ianuary 17. 1619. By Stephen Denison, minister of Gods word, at Katherine Kree Church, in the citie of London.
author: Denison, Stephen, d. 1649 or 50.
publisher: Printed by Richard Field, dwelling in great Woodstreete,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
